Name: wmo_wis2_gm_metricserver_status_flag
Description: Status of the metric endpoint for centre (1-up and 0-down)

Name: wmo_wis2_gm_metricserver_last_scrape_timestamp_seconds
Description: Timestamp of last succesful metric scrape

Name: wmo_wis2_gm_invalid_metrics_total
Description: Number of invalid metrics from center

Name: wmo_wis2_gm_ims_connected_flag
Description: Connection status from gm to WMO IMS (1-up and 0-down)

Name: wmo_wis2_gm_messages_alert_published_total
Description: Number of alert messages with different levels (warning; error; critical) that report the issue of the target centre

Name: wmo_wis2_gm_tickets_published_total
Description: Number of ticket that report the issue of the target centre
